boat.full_description:
The first Bermudian yacht built  by Cole and Wiggins, whose yard in Leigh-on-Sea later became Johnson and Jago.

Pre WWII she sailed out of Littlehampton, but from 1952 she was based in North Kent before migrating north over the Thames in the 1969s. During the 1970s she was sunk on her mooring in Pagglesham due to a collision, but was refloated and repaired before being sold to a new owner who kept her at Glasson Dock. Her history after 2016 is not known.
boat.name: Maris
